snippet: Mayor Martin J. Walsh of Boston, who still opposes holding a referendum on his city’s Olympic bid, appeared to bow to wide public support for such a vote.
abstract: Boston Mayor Martin J Walsh says he will not block referendum on city's hosting 2024 Summer Olympics, though he is not in favor of putting issue before voters because it could sour United States Olympic Committee's consideration of city.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Martin J. Walsh of Boston, who still opposes holding a referendum on his city’s Olympic bid, appeared to bow to wide public support for such a vote.

headline.main: Boston Mayor Says He Won’t Try to Block Referendum on Hosting 2024 Olympics
headline.print_headline: Boston Mayor Says He Won’t Try to Block Referendum on Hosting 2024 Olympics
